name: 企業管理概論
comment: 企管系大一學生學號末碼為單數號請選修企業管理概論A班;末碼為雙數號請選修企業管理概論B班。非企管系同學需待全校加退選開始後，才得進行線上選課和利用授課碼選課方式。欲加修本課程的學生，請務必出席第一節課處理授權碼事宜，不必事先寫信給教授。
description: This course focuses on the conceptual framework and case study in the field of business administration. The aim is to help students understand the basic perspectives (e.g., operation, marketing, human resource, finance, innovation, business ethics, information system etc.) on business administration and realize the new trends in the business administration.
